string.value: I got a book called "How to make black clouds" in Orbis. Isn't this Hugh's book? I should return it.

Hugh said it's not his book. However, he told me that it has information on how to make something amazing. Hugh said he'll make it and asked me to bring him the ingredients....I have to see Kay and Porter to get some of the ingredients. This is going to take some time. 

#i4031462# #t4031462# #b#c4031462# / 1#k
#i4000133##t4000133# #b#c4000133# / 10#k
#i4003000##t4003000# #b#c4003000# / 50#k
#i4000183##t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 100#k
#i4011001##t4011001# #b#c4011001# / 20#k
#i4000115##t4000115# #b#c4000115# / 50#k
#i4031478##t4031478# #b#c4031478# / 1#k
Hugh completed the black cloud maker!

What! You're disturbing my research. Go away! Huh? You came here to bring me a book? What are you talking about? Hey, Do you think I'm dumb enough to lose research data? Recipe for a Black Cloud? I don't study such crap! ...but wait...Black Cloud? Let me read this book, there may be something of value in it.
...Hmm... Oh... Ah... This is interesting. I don't know who this is but he's doing pretty interesting research. The great scientist Hugh will complete the research. You should join me!

Intrigued are we? Well, looks like we'll need a #b1 Ventilating Fan, 100 Ink Bottles, 50 Screws, 1 Long-lasting Battery, 50 Cogs, 10 Dual Pirate's Propeller and 20 Steel#k. That'll be enough to produce a Black Cloud machine. After you gather them, return to me and I'll assemble everything!

Ah. Ask #bKay#k from Earth defense HQ to make a ventilation fan as he knows how to make it. He's young but quite good. Let me see... #bPorter#k is supposed to give me durable batteries so that I can use them. Ok? Kay and Porter. Get going!
What? You don't want to? You're strange. Why did you bring me a book if you don't want to know what's in it? How strange...
Oh~ you gathered everything. Pretty good. I can build this Black Cloud machine by just assembling parts! Here you gp!
The great scientist Hugh can make everything! Hahaha!
What? Haven't you gathered all the ingredients I need? I, Hugh, will make it for you. It it that hard just to get the ingredients?
